scripts.dev: yarn build-dev && theme deploy && concurrently --prefix command "parcel watch app/scripts/theme.js --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.js --public-url ./" "parcel watch app/styles/theme.scss --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.css --public-url ./ --no-cache" "theme watch"
scripts.build-dev: yarn clean && parcel build app/scripts/theme.js --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.js --public-url ./ --no-minify && parcel build app/styles/theme.scss --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.css --public-url ./ --no-minify --no-cache
scripts.build: yarn clean && parcel build app/scripts/theme.js --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.js --public-url ./ && parcel build app/styles/theme.scss --out-dir ./assets --out-file theme.css --public-url ./ --no-cache
